sections.Biography:
===[[Season 1]]===
He is captured by the forces of [[House Stark]]. [[Robb Stark]] interrogates him and learns that he has overestimated the size of the Stark army as 20,000 strong rather than its actual size of 18,000 men. Robb feigns mercy and lets him go so the incorrect estimate will be reported.<ref>"[[The Pointy End]]"</ref>
